Literature.Title: Gene expression and localization of the epinecidin-1 antimicrobial peptide in the grouper (Epinephelus coioides), and its role in protecting fish against pathogenic infection.

Literature.Title: Epinecidin-1, a highly potent marine antimicrobial peptide with anticancer and immunomodulatory activities.
